snippet: MIRLESSE--Etienne, 61, music film producer and founder of the global HDTV music channel iConcerts, passed away on the 28th of March 2016, in Sion, Switzerland, from heart failure. He is survived by his wife and business partner, Natalia Tsarkova-Mirlesse, and his daughters Samantha and Anastasia. A memorial will take place at the Church of Saint Etienne outside Paris in Issy-les-Moulineaux, 92130, France, on the 29th of April 2016 at 2:30pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MIRLESSE--Etienne, 61, music film producer and founder of the global HDTV music channel iConcerts, passed away on the 28th of March 2016, in Sion, Switzerland, from heart failure. He is survived by his wife and business partner, Natalia Tsarkova-Mirlesse, and his daughters Samantha and Anastasia. A memorial will take place at the Church of Saint Etienne outside Paris in Issy-les-Moulineaux, 92130, France, on the 29th of April 2016 at 2:30pm. 1/3
